title: Celtic Circle of Life Charm with Lobster Claw Clasp, Charms for Bracelets and Necklaces
description: Experience the quality of Rembrandt Charms. This Celtic Circle Of Life Charm with lobster claw clasp is stamped with the metal quality mark and RQC trademark. All Rembrandt products have a Lifetime guaranteed. Please note the images above are enlarged to show detail. The charm is 17.48 MM long x 18.78 MM wide, it's handcrafted, made to perfectly fit your charm bracelet and will be great add-on to any charm collection.
